chunks.text: Congratulations! You just got hired at Keko Corp. They're the latest Silicon Valley startup

chunks.title: Your First Day.mp3
chunks.text: to hit the scene. They help analyze data of large companies and consult on what companies

chunks.title: Your First Day.mp3
chunks.text: should do with their data. They do autonomous vehicles, security cameras. They have an online

chunks.title: Your First Day.mp3
chunks.text: dating app. The website, they even have drones. They also offer their services, like Amazon,

chunks.title: Your First Day.mp3
chunks.text: to other big companies or startups. You just got hired. Awesome. Wait, what is your role?

chunks.title: Your First Day.mp3
chunks.text: Well you're the new machine learning and data science expert. Well this is a little awkward

chunks.title: Your First Day.mp3
chunks.text: because you don't really know anything about that, do you? Maybe a little bit. Maybe

chunks.title: Your First Day.mp3
chunks.text: you've heard it in the news, but hmm this is going to be awkward because it's too late.

chunks.title: Your First Day.mp3
chunks.text: You're already hired and people want you working right away. So you enter the office and oh

chunks.title: Your First Day.mp3
chunks.text: there's your boss right there. This guy over here with the perfect hair, that's Bruno.

chunks.title: Your First Day.mp3
chunks.text: He just got promoted and he's really excited to make an impact with Keko Corp in their data

chunks.title: Your First Day.mp3
chunks.text: division and he just hired you to lead some of their initiatives. Now he seems nice on

chunks.title: Your First Day.mp3
chunks.text: the surface, but I have a feeling that he's going to be a tough cookie to work with, but you

chunks.title: Your First Day.mp3
chunks.text: know what we'll get through this. Now if your memory is fuzzy of how you ended up here

chunks.title: Your First Day.mp3
chunks.text: at Keko Corp, let's not worry about that. It's your first day on the job. All you know is that

chunks.title: Your First Day.mp3
chunks.text: you're the new machine learning and data science expert. Now because this is your first day

chunks.title: Your First Day.mp3
chunks.text: as you do, you go out for lunch with your coworkers and luckily they don't ask you too many questions

chunks.title: Your First Day.mp3
chunks.text: and they seem too like you. They seem to be nice, but then during lunch comes the question.

chunks.title: Your First Day.mp3
chunks.text: Hey, we've heard about this machine learning thing and Bruno said that you're the expert on the

chunks.title: Your First Day.mp3
chunks.text: topic and we're excited to have you on the team, but what is machine learning? And you think to

chunks.title: Your First Day.mp3
chunks.text: yourself, oh boy, what should I say here? Well, you know what guys, I have to go back to work,

chunks.title: Your First Day.mp3
chunks.text: don't have much time. I'll explain it to you tomorrow. So you ran away, still confused how you got

chunks.title: Your First Day.mp3
chunks.text: here, but luckily the day ends with you not revealing that you know absolutely nothing and you have

chunks.title: Your First Day.mp3
chunks.text: no idea how you just got hired. You survived the first day, but we have a problem, right? Tomorrow

chunks.title: Your First Day.mp3
chunks.text: you have to go into work and you're going to have to explain this to your colleagues. Hopefully

chunks.title: Your First Day.mp3
chunks.text: you can survive throughout the next couple of weeks and let people know that you're not an imposter,

chunks.title: Your First Day.mp3
chunks.text: but hmm, what should we do here? Well, luckily for you, you remember your old childhood friends,

chunks.title: Your First Day.mp3
chunks.text: their name, Andre and Daniel. Look how cute they were as a baby. You call them up and you say,

chunks.title: Your First Day.mp3
chunks.text: hey, somehow I landed this job in Silicon Valley, it's really well-paying, but I have no idea

chunks.title: Your First Day.mp3
chunks.text: what I'm talking about. And luckily for you, they know. So they're going to help you throughout

chunks.title: Your First Day.mp3
chunks.text: this journey to make sure that Bruno doesn't fire you and you impress all your colleagues.

chunks.title: Your First Day.mp3
chunks.text: What we're going to do is each day at work, you're going to get some tasks and then you're going

chunks.title: Your First Day.mp3
chunks.text: to go back home and Andre and Daniel are going to help you so that, well, you don't get fired.

chunks.title: Your First Day.mp3
chunks.text: So, here we are, all of us at home trying to decide how we're going to tackle this first problem,

chunks.title: Your First Day.mp3
chunks.text: that is what is machine learning. We have to go into work tomorrow and explain it to our colleagues.

chunks.title: Your First Day.mp3
chunks.text: Let's get to it. What is machine learning?
